name: Programming Languages
title: Learn Python Programming Beginner
description: Python is a very popular programming language because it is fast, versatile and easy to understand. This free online Python course will hone your passion for programming by taking you through the fundamentals and more advanced features of Python. You will learn exactly how Python programming works, the different applications that Python can work for such as software development and mathematical computations and which areas you can apply them in.

name: Data Science and Machine Learning
title: Statistics Data Science and Business Analysis
description: In this course you will understand i.the fundamentals of statistics,ii.Learn how to work with different types of data,iii.How to plot different types of data,iv.Calculate the measures of central tendency, asymmetry, and variability,v.Calculate correlation and covariance,vi.Distinguish and work with different types of distributions ,vii.Estimate confidence intervals,viii.Perform hypothesis testing,ix.Make data driven decisions,x.Understand the mechanics of regression analysis,xi.Carry out regression analysis,xii.Use and understand dummy variables,xiii.Understand the concepts needed for data science even with Python and R!

name: Design
title: Learn Adobe CC with our Masterclass
description: In this course you will understand i.You will have beginner to expert level knowledge of graphic design and Adobe CC applications that you will immediately be able to apply to your career, job, hobby, or company,ii.You will be given a major overview of the most common graphic design programs and how you can use them to your advantage,iii.You will be given real-world, applicable projects that you can follow along with and practice,iv.You will achieve the experience and knowledge to take graphic design fundamentals and apply them in your everyday life,v.You will learn Adobe Photoshop, the industry-leading program for photo editing and manipulation,vi.You will learn Adobe Illustrator, the number one software for creating graphics, icons, symbols, branding, and more,vii.You will learn Adobe XD, the premiere software for creating stunning web design and mobile app design mockups, viii.You will learn Adobe InDesign, the best software on the market for publishing and marketing materials.

name: Development
title: Software Development from A-Z for Beginner

name: Photography
title: Photography Courses for Beginner
description: In this course you will 1.Learn to build applications as a software engineer,2.Learn about Object Oriented Programming and agile development,3.Learn how to implement popular computer science algorithms, 4.Get acquainted with machine learning

name: English
title: Learn English with our Masterclass
description: In this course you will,1.Improve English speaking confidence and basic conversation skills in common topics.2.Learn to speak more like a native English speaker with British pronunciation.3.Increase your English fluency and upgrade your speaking vocabulary.4.Use the unique Speak. Write. Recite. method to memorize scripts and develop your language.
